body.name: Dazzling Swan Jewelry Collection, Blue Crystals, Pink Crystals, Clear Crystals
features: Measurements: 14 7/8 inch rose-gold tone plated chain, 7/8 x 5/8 inch pink and clear crystal swan pendant
Subtle Glamour: This swan pendant combines the precision and quality of sparkling pink and white Swarovski crystals with cool romance for your everyday look, for an eye-catching fashion accessory
Classically dazzling: Featuring the iconic swan motif with a full-cut crystal body in millennial pink and crisp clear pavé lines, this beautiful piece has a bold aesthetic for extra everyday sparkle
Designed to last: Swarovski jewelry will maintain its brilliance over time when simple care practices are observed; remove before contact with water, lotions or perfumes to extend your jewelry's life
Versatile and timeless: With prong-set crystals that hang above brim for extra glamour, this spectacular pendant pairs with simpler accessories or fits with matching pieces for a more curated look
Items delivered: 1 x Swarovski Dazzling Swan Collection Pendant, 14 7/8 inch rose-gold tone plated chain, 7/8 x 5/8 inch pink and clear crystal swan pendant, with Swarovski necklace box

productInformation.value: #85,778 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #90 in Women's Y-Necklaces

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Swarovski Necklaces and Pendants Discover our spellbinding collection of necklaces with pendants. From statement colorful pieces to delicate necklaces in silver or gold plated tones with crystallized pendants, find the perfect match to suit your signature style and personality.

How to clean Swarovski Jewelry Wash and dry your hands. Use a soft, lint-free cloth* to gently clean the product from every angle. For pendants and necklaces, clean the chain last as this is likely to be the dirtiest part. When cleaning pierced earrings, hold your jewelry piece by the post (the part that goes into the earlobe). If possible, clean after every wear to remove any dirt or other signs of daily wear. *A lint-free cloth is a special type of cleaning cloth that does not release any fluff. You can purchase these cloths online, in DIY shops, or in some supermarkets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful and like it!
reviews.reviewText: I love this necklace! it's so elegant but simple that it goes well with anything. I purchased a small black swan necklace and loved it so much that I decided to get this one as well. I'm so glad I did!I like this one a little better since it doesn't slide around like the black one does. It's also bigger than my black one which I like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mom loved this!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my mom's 60th birthday. She loves it and says the detail and sparkle are impressive and beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This necklace is so beautiful omg

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bracelet as a Christmas gift for my daughter and I believe she will be surprised and very happy. Two years ago I bought for her a Swarovski Swan pendant necklace in rose gold, so I was thrilled to find this bracelet, which will make a great companion piece to her necklace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute bracelet, but magnetic clip is annoying
reviews.reviewText: I've had this bracelet for 2 months now, and its super cute. It's very light weight. At first, i was afraid the length wouldnt fit my thick wrist LOL, but luckily it did with some space too. something i dont like about it is the magnetic clip part. it never aligns properly on the first try, so i have to fumble around with one hand all the time to fix it, which is difficult to do :/

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but small
reviews.reviewText: I love this but it’s so small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: They look much better in person than in the picture. Even though they are small, sparkle gets attention. Chian is removable, just swans look cllasic and wonderful. With chain, they look fancy.Rose gold enhances the Swarovski crystals. I have been Swarovski for a decade and still like to buy new pieces. Even after many years, they don't lose their shine and look new. I would highly recommend these to anyone. They are great for gifts.If you are used to big earrings these might not for you.

Es hermosoooo, se lo regale a la niña que me gusta y le gustó muchoo, aparte de que es fan de los kdramas y de belleza verdadera, cuando se lo di casi llora, en cuestión de envío llegó antes y muy bien empaquetado.

J'ai fait l'acquisition du collier Swarovski Dazzling Swan en bleu, métal rhodié, et je suis absolument enchantée par cet achat. La livraison a été rapide et l'emballage était impeccable, assurant ainsi la protection de ce bijou éblouissant.📦 **Livraison et emballage** : La livraison a été rapide et l'emballage était impeccable, assurant ainsi la protection de ce bijou éblouissant. L'attention portée à l'emballage montre le souci du détail de Swarovski pour garantir que le collier arrive en parfait état entre les mains du client.💎 **Design et qualité** : Le collier Swarovski Dazzling Swan est un véritable chef-d'œuvre de design. Le cygne, symbole emblématique de la marque, est magnifiquement représenté avec des cristaux bleus éblouissants, ajoutant une touche de sophistication à n'importe quelle tenue. Le métal rhodié garantit la durabilité et la brillance à long terme du collier.✨ **Brillance et éclat** : Les cristaux bleus scintillants du collier Swarovski captent la lumière de manière spectaculaire, créant un éclat éblouissant qui attire instantanément l'attention. C'est un accessoire qui ne passe pas inaperçu et qui ajoute une touche de glamour à n'importe quelle occasion.💖 **Polyvalence et style** : Ce collier est incroyablement polyvalent et peut être porté avec une variété de tenues, qu'il s'agisse d'une tenue décontractée ou d'une soirée élégante. Son design intemporel en fait un accessoire parfait pour compléter n'importe quel look avec élégance et style.En bref : Je recommande
Es ist ein kleiner Schwan aber so schön und schmeichelnd.Ein sehr schönes Geschenk.
Molto bello e luminoso,figurone con una amica .
Offert pour ma compagne, elle est heureuse ❤️Très jolie. Collier.
